situation: A thin high-strength steel plate having a thickness of 40mm has a height of 120mm and length of 350mm. It is subjected to a moment at both ends = 66kN-m. E=28000MPa.

subquestions.question: Which of the following most nearly gives its radius of curvature?
Which of the following most nearly gives the bending stress of the steel plate in MPa?
Which of the following most nearly gives the deflection of the plate in mm?
